"Is Zephetto's... uh... body in here?": "What is being housed here is the template of the 4th clone."

"It has been instilled with combat data,
but it has not yet received a mind of its own."
"What are you saying?"

"Don't tell me you're planning to use us
as part of another experiment..."
"...I am not."
"My body... was lost in the previous battle..."
"...What?"
"After our battle, I flew off to confront the Starless."

"While I succeeded in driving them off,
my body suffered irreparable damage."

"Which is why I used my power
to transfer my consciousness into Faria."
"So, all this time you've been in Faria's mind?"
"Correct."
"So from the beginning, your goal was to lead us here?"
"Yes."
"So, what are you after this time?"

"I wish to transfer my
consciousness into the 4th clone."

"To return to being the
governor of the Resurgent ARKS?"

"To fight and put an end
to the war against the Starless."

"The 4th clone is an entity that
feeds on your strength, 909."

"It has been storing all of
your combat data up to this point."

"I have created an ARKS that
surpasses the strongest ARKS."
"...Are you sure about that?"
"...I guess we'll have to find out if that's true."
"Then why don't we gather more data and..."
"There's no time!"
"I cannot remain in this body for much longer."
"I need a vessel into which I can anchor my consciousness."
"...Oh no."
"Faria, you know the procedure, yes?"
"I do."
"Alright. Let's begin."
"To think that this kind of power existed..."
"Alright... Good, good..."
"Starless?!"
"So they managed to get here after all..."
"We'll buy you some time."
"You're taking responsibility for all of this."
"...I see."
"...Of course. That is my intention."
"Been a while since all three of us have fought together."
"Indeed it has."
